## ðŸ”„ Dynamic Image Selection

The page automatically selects the correct industry image based on the `$industry->title` from the database, ensuring each industry gets relevant, contextual imagery.

### Fallback System:
If an industry doesn't have a specific image mapping, it falls back to a generic business/technology image.
